perimeter_locations: Set up a traffic management point near the emergency location (Av. Campo del Sur, 262) to prevent congestion and ensure safety of pedestrians and other vehicles.
Establish a perimeter around the high-severity electrical fire site with clear access for emergency responders.
Deploy a crowd control point in a nearby area to maintain order and prevent unauthorized access to the emergency site.
action_details: The traffic management team will deploy 2 officers near the emergency location to manage traffic flow, prevent congestion, and ensure pedestrian safety. Additionally, 1 officer will be deployed as incident commander at the scene of the high-severity electrical fire to coordinate response efforts. Two other officers will be stationed for crowd control in nearby areas to maintain order.
